channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Scott's Vacation House Rules
channel.desc: In every episode Scott McGillivray helps make homeowner's dreams come true by unlocking the hidden potential in their dated, uninspired vacation property.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Virtually Home
channel.desc: People with interior design dilemmas are offered a helping hand by some of the UKs top interior designers, alongside the use of some cutting-edge virtual reality technology.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Raw Vegan Not Gross
channel.desc: Laura makes vegan chili, builds a fresh veggie salad with a very special guest, and shows you how to make the best bento box for lunch on the go.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Good Food Kitchen
channel.desc: Danielle makes a black and cornmeal torte and guest chef Nelly cooks a fish pie. Katrina shares her cauliflower recipe. Lastly Adam and Julia show us their home-made dishes.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Farmhouse Facelift
channel.desc: Billy and Carolyn are tasked with taking a builder's basic home interior and injecting it with authentic farmhouse character and charm.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Luxury Listings
channel.desc: Luxury Listings showcases South Africa's most opulent homes, revealing standout features and what sets each property apart as the ultimate in luxury living.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Open Homes
channel.desc: Join our expert home and garden designer hosts Michael & Carlene Duffy, as they take a tour through some of the most awe-inspiring properties you'll ever see.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Styled
channel.desc: Styled follows the adventures of Nicole Babb and Caffery VanHorne, best friends and design experts working together in Nicole's family-run staging and interior design business.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Real Health
channel.desc: Real Health is a lifestyle show featuring holistic health solutions in an easy to absorb and palatable manner.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Home Rescue
channel.desc: R?is?n, Peter and the crew come to the rescue of deli worker, Linda. Her home is so cluttered, she and her two sons can barely get around and she never invites guests in.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: AfriMaxx
channel.desc: Afrimaxx is a show celebrating contemporary African lifestyle. The show seeks out the continent's finest design and lifestyle innovation across the spectrum - from interiors and architecture to fashion, arts, food and travel.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Tiny Homes
channel.desc: Whether you're looking for inspiration on the latest decor trends, considering home improvements, or searching for your dream home... The Home Channel is your solution.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Farmhouse Facelift
channel.desc: Billy and Carolyn are tasked with taking a builder's basic home interior and injecting it with authentic farmhouse character and charm.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Escape To The Country
channel.desc: People seeking to get away from city life ask the experts to help them find their perfect country home.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Scott's Vacation House Rules
channel.desc: In every episode Scott McGillivray helps make homeowner's dreams come true by unlocking the hidden potential in their dated, uninspired vacation property.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Real Health
channel.desc: Real Health is a lifestyle show featuring holistic health solutions in an easy to absorb and palatable manner.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Home Rescue
channel.desc: R?is?n, Peter and the crew come to the rescue of deli worker, Linda. Her home is so cluttered, she and her two sons can barely get around and she never invites guests in.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Styled
channel.desc: Styled follows the adventures of Nicole Babb and Caffery VanHorne, best friends and design experts working together in Nicole's family-run staging and interior design business.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Virtually Home
channel.desc: People with interior design dilemmas are offered a helping hand by some of the UKs top interior designers, alongside the use of some cutting-edge virtual reality technology.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Good Food Kitchen
channel.desc: Danielle makes a black and cornmeal torte and guest chef Nelly cooks a fish pie. Katrina shares her cauliflower recipe. Lastly Adam and Julia show us their home-made dishes.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Tiny Homes
channel.desc: Whether you're looking for inspiration on the latest decor trends, considering home improvements, or searching for your dream home... The Home Channel is your solution.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Raw Vegan Not Gross
channel.desc: Laura makes vegan chili, builds a fresh veggie salad with a very special guest, and shows you how to make the best bento box for lunch on the go.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: AfriMaxx
channel.desc: Afrimaxx is a show celebrating contemporary African lifestyle. The show seeks out the continent's finest design and lifestyle innovation across the spectrum - from interiors and architecture to fashion, arts, food and travel.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Scott's Vacation House Rules
channel.desc: In every episode Scott McGillivray helps make homeowner's dreams come true by unlocking the hidden potential in their dated, uninspired vacation property.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Grand Designs UK
channel.desc: Grand Designs UK, hosted by designer and writer Kevin McCloud, follows intrepid homebuilders as they pursue their architectural dreams.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: School Night Dinners
channel.desc: In this episode, we'll be exploring the foods that feed the belly and fuel the brain! Then Nic and Ian cook up some sweet treats featuring Selasi Gbormittah.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Luxury Homes Revealed
channel.desc: On Luxury Homes Revealed our first home is located in Montecito, California. Then we check out a European inspired Montecito mansion.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Luxury Listings
channel.desc: Luxury Listings showcases South Africa's most opulent homes, revealing standout features and what sets each property apart as the ultimate in luxury living.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Creative Living
channel.desc: Peter Wolfkamp guides the Graham family through the total rebuild of their 100 year old heritage villa.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Real Health
channel.desc: Real Health is a lifestyle show featuring holistic health solutions in an easy to absorb and palatable manner.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Home Rescue
channel.desc: R?is?n, Peter and the crew come to the rescue of deli worker, Linda. Her home is so cluttered, she and her two sons can barely get around and she never invites guests in.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Gardening 101 With Melanie Walker
channel.desc: We visit the Margaret Roberts Herbal Centre to find out about the continuation of the late Margaret Robert's legacy. We show you how to make a raised garden bed.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Luxury Homes Revealed
channel.desc: On Luxury Homes Revealed our first home is located in Montecito, California. Then we check out a European inspired Montecito mansion.

channel.title: Open Homes
channel.desc: Join our expert home and garden designer hosts Michael & Carlene Duffy, as they take a tour through some of the most awe-inspiring properties you'll ever see.

channel.title: Tiny Homes
channel.desc: Whether you're looking for inspiration on the latest decor trends, considering home improvements, or searching for your dream home... The Home Channel is your solution.
